content.prompt: Which of the following claims does al-Jabarti make about the French?

choices.label: The French are Muslim but pretend to be Christian.
The French are Christian but pretend to be Muslim.
The French do not believe in either Christianity or Islam.
The French have created a new religion of their own.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
